page.title: 02The High Street
page.content: { Billericay}being a commuter area has a mobile population and this is reflected by the number of{Estate {Agents}(8),{Solicitors}(4) and{ {Insurance Offices}(4) in the High Street. There is concern in the town that the gaps left by empty shops are being filled with offices so reducing the choice of retail outlets. There are still 2{Butchers}in the high street, 3{Greengrocers}and 1{ {Fishmonger}but otherwise food shopping is done in supermarkets. There are 3{Shoe Shops}, 1{Toy {Shop}, several{Hairdressers}, a{Beauty {Salon}and 2{Sports Shops}. The centre of the High Street is dominated by the{Anglican Church}.
